metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34677 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer handler, where an unprivileged regular user can cause an integerto be truncated, which may lead to denial of service or data tampering.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34677` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
